body:
Until we have global debug, I'd like to be able to specify a variant to build mpich with debug. Here are notes for doing that. cc @alecbcs I'll try updating autamus to use this variant. Here are instructions for debug for mpich:

https://wiki.mpich.org/mpich/index.php/Building_MPICH_For_Development

Signed-off-by: vsoch <vsoch@users.noreply.github.com>
title: Adding ability to build mpich with debug
